radiographic_examinations.findings: Quantitative analysis showed a lung weight of 2,101.00 g with an excess tissue mass of 1,311.26 g and only 5% normally aerated lung parenchyma.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: CT scan taken on day 46 was nearly identical to the scan taken on day 1, showing no significant changes. A whole-lung CT scan on day 55 showed marked improvement in lung aeration.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Persistence of diffuse ground-glass opacification, more marked in the lower lobes.
